code: var taskID=100;export var createTask=function createTask(task){return{type:'CREATE_TASK',id:"task-".concat(++taskID),taskInfo:task};};export var updateBoard=function updateBoard(board){return{type:'UPDATE_BOARD',board:board};};export var deleteTask=function deleteTask(taskId,columnId){return{type:'DELETE_TASK',taskId:taskId,columnId:columnId};};
